references.paper_title: Physics-informed neural networks: A deep learning framework for solving forward and inverse problems involving nonlinear partial differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) framework, which is a crucial predecessor and highly related to the research presented in this paper.

references.paper_title: Fourier neural operator for parametric partial differential equations
references.reason: This paper introduces the Fourier Neural Operator (FNO), which is a highly influential neural operator architecture used as a primary model in the presented research.

references.paper_title: Neural operator: Learning maps between function spaces with applications to PDEs
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive theoretical analysis of neural operators and serves as a key theoretical reference for the current work.
This paper is foundational to the concept of in-context learning, which is leveraged in this paper for improving out-of-distribution performance.

references.paper_title: Masked autoencoders are scalable vision learners
references.reason: This paper introduces the Masked Autoencoder (MAE) framework, which is adopted in this paper for unsupervised pretraining on unlabeled PDE data.
